Mod.Name: Madmod_v0.9.1
Mod.Author: MartianMadman
Mod.Description: Madmod is a large overhaul mod that aims to make the game a much better experience. You will need to start a new game for all changes to take effect. This mod is most likely to be incompatible with other mod manager mods. Fov options represent vertical fov.

Tweak_Table_Entry.Name: Player_vehicle_collision_damage_max
Tweak_Table_Entry.Description: Max amount of collision damage a vehicle can to the player or VIP.
